textBeforeTable: The Board of Directors of Alps Electric Co., Ltd, at its meeting held on April 27, 2012, has decided a plan for changes to its management. These changes are subject to approval at the Shareholders Meeting, scheduled on June 22, 2012, and shall take effect immediately thereafter. Changes in Management Representatives : Announcement of Changes in Management Representatives TEL (03)5499-8026(IR Direct) CSR Dept. (Code 6770, TSE 1st Section) Inquiries to: Yasuhiro Nakai, Senior Manager President: Masataka Kataoka Company name: Alps Electric Co., Ltd For Immediate Release April 27, 2012 *Required fields Message : (You can enter multiple email addresses separated by commas) To* : From* : Name : Last Name : Send by mail: 04/27/2012 | 06:49am US/Eastern
textAfterTable: Alps will increase enterprise value as well as corporate performance by rejuvenation of top management with having two representative directors. Profile and Career Summary of the new President to be appointed : Name : Toshihiro Kuriyama Date of Birth : April 25th, 1957 Business : Apr. 1980 Joined Alps Electric Co., Ltd. Jun. 2004 Director Jun. 2011 Managing Director Shareholdings in Alps 6,963 Shares distributed by
